name: NEW! Heart Coil Rings!
description:
Funky, fresh & girlie! This coil ring is made of solid brass then plated in either 18k gold or Silver.

Coil rings come in a variety of shapes, sizes and adornments... stay tuned for more!

name: UNION Parts & Recreation Bicycle Jewelry- Crank-set Charm Necklace
description:
From Confection Jewels' new line of parts and recreational inspired jewelry and charms comes, UNION the Brand, Parts & Recreation. 

Show your enthusiasm for the sport and aesthetic behind the art of bicycle building & design.

This little guy is an exact replica of a crankset that you would find on any classic road, track or fixed gear bike! It stands at a little over an inch tall and a half inch across. Comes in several finishes such as shiny silver or gold, gunmetal, oxidized silver and oxidized brass with a ball chain color of your choice. Please specify which color chain you would like, in the notes, upon check-out. (gold, silver or black) 30 inch ball chain can be cut down to your preferred size.

Unisex style designed for men and women alike. Comes with small velvet pouch for storage & protection. Designed & Made in the USA.

For all inquires regarding wholesale or personal orders please contact: wholesale@confectionjewels.com or unionparts@confectionjewels.com otherwise visit www.unionthebrand.com for more info.

description:

Tiny tool-shaped charms that can be worn singly or layered on thick in mixed-match finishes. 

Comes in Antique Gold, Antique Silver or Natural Oxidized Brass charm and ball chain color of your choice. 30 inch ball chain can be cut down to your preferred size.

-Silver
-Natural Brass

-Copper

name: "Rock the Casbah" Brass Adjustable ring
description: Part of Confection Jewels' newly designed collection series. This fabulous button ring has deeply inscribed patterns resembling that of Moroccan design and architecture. Set your Fall wardrobe off with this versatile, light and easy to wear statement piece.

name: Pretty Heart Gem Ring
description:
Part of Confection Jewels' newly designed collection series. This fabulous gemmy ring is the perfect accessory to any holiday outfit. Wear it alone as a statement piece or stacked along with other eclectic rings and bracelets. Makes a great gift too!

*More colors available!

name: Italian Stallion Oversized Cocktail Ring
description: This Fall favorite gives you the sweet and classic look of equestrian style with a touch of boho-rock. A beautiful Italian leather button set into a natural brass adjustable ring. Custom size and color combinations available- please inquire.

name: Brain Coral Oversized Cocktail Ring
description:
Made with a beautiful glass button resembling exotic Brain Coral, this piece will bring much life and excitement to any classic, modern or boho ensemble. Encased in a beautiful natural solid brass adjustable ring, let this statement ring do all the talking. 

Also available in Silver- please inquire.

name: Cone Spike Gaga Ring
description: Italian-made Cone Stud button converted into sleek and modern ring. Mounted on silver adjustable ring base, this statement piece pays tribute to Miss Lady Gaga herself. Freak it ladies!

name: Moon & Stars Oversized Cocktail ring
description: This mystical statement ring is made of a large vintage button with hand-enameled moon and stars. Comfortable and easy to wear, this ring could easily become a staple in just about anyones accessory wardrobe.

name: The Yurman
description: Owed to one of my favorite jewelry designers, David Yurman. This classic, wearable style of two-toned silver and gold mirrored button with gold rope detail is versatile yet statement driven. Medium sized, not too big and definitely not small. Placed on adjustable, silver-plated natural brass setting. You can't miss.
